name: Fethod the Ray and the Decaying Bay.
name_original: Fethod the Ray and the Decaying Bay.
description: Fethod the Ray must fight his way through an army of ghost fish killed by the horrible pollution in his ocean, as well as turrets left over from evil oil corporations! Fethod the Ray and the Decaying Bay is a 2D side scrolling action game which focuses on carefully using movement to destroy enemies and not the environment.
